Please do not give up!

comments.comment:
There is no doubt you had good ideas and you opened people's eye in Sri Lanka.
But there are a lot of unanswered questions about where you are today. Why did you wait for the last minute to find a political party? Isn't that presidential candidate do first? At least a year before?
Unfortunately, you were overconfidence of you. That makes you blind. No point blaming NPM now. You blame JVP until recent past. Now going to join with them. I doubt your integrity?

L board Lanka

@Dev De Silva Exactly. He is ex customs and you know how those guys bend the law to take bribes. I think he has a media unit that is tasked with posting positive comments on-line. That is why you see so much praise for him still on-line. I think I will go with Mahesh. I heard them speak. They make sense. During the Sirasa's Satana debate Dr. Gamini Wijesinghe's speech drew spontaneous applause from the audience just because what he said made common sense. All the other speakers had to bring in people to clap for them.

I think this guy is one of the best con men in the world!

comments.comment:
Jungle of Asia. There is no place for honest and credible people in Sri Lanka. I was always under the impression that there was a plot involving Mahesh, Ajith and Gamini Wijesinghe They all were ass lickers of corrupt politicians for over 40 years. . I have made many comments about this. I became interested in Sri Lanka because of this Great Man Nanganda. I had cut off SriLanka for the last 45 years because of rogue politicians.    Buddha had said you are born to suffer but forgot to say if you are born in Sri Lanka.
As from today I stop reading the news papers of the jungle. I'll only restart if Nag comes to the political arena. A man who should be worshiped and followed was back stabbed. You three showed your true Sri Lankan colours and will rot in hell one day. p.s. Gamini Wijesinghe you are bloody a traitor. Poor Srilankans will pay a heavy price for your action.
comments.author: Lionel MO

replies.replyComment: I agree . You are absolutely correct.

comments.comment: Mr.Nagananda, if  you are a WISE man you should join with Mahesh Senanayaka(NPM) and request him ( or even plead with him) to accept your constitution and to present it to the electorate when canvassing so as to implement it after winning. Come to a written guarantee with him to that effect as you envisaged thus far. Act wisely at least this time! Remember,  your constitution was the last hope many Srilankans dreamt of.

replies.replyComment:
@George Peter Methana thienne no idea of politics nevei , manushayakama nathi eka. Eka stage eke indala , Nagage pracharaka vada use karala , anthimata koka pennuva , Kok charlie vage in 1965. 


Nagage eka interview ekaka thienava    Mahesh Senanayaka gana. Eda, MS kiyanava Nagata , Naga me rate president venava kiyala. E interview eka hoyaganna puluvannam hari vadagath.

Mahes is ok. But he was manipulated by NPM - a group of so called  professionals with no idea of politics, which included Gamini Wijesinghe,  Colonne, Vinya Ariyaratne etc., who were dead against NK  from day1. That's why NK broke away from NPM. So this was pay back time.
Mahesh Senanayaka Nagava Pavadunna. katha karanne kohomada , evage pudgalayot ekka ?
They will never  except Nagas constitution. If so they would have given him the chance before. All president candidates have their own agenda. Can't trust them.

We all know your Mahesh and Kolonne went directly to meet Sajith after placing deposits. Now Nagananda is also revealing their dirty work.
